item.title: First Post for test
item.description: Testing,

item.title: Activities and Projects
item.description:
Competitive Programming

  • Union of Clubs for Programming Contest (UCPC) (Jan. 25 – Sep. 25)
    Vice President

  • shake! (Sep. {22-25} - Jan. {23-26})
    Director, Problem Setter

  • Ajou Programming Contest (APC) (Mar. {22-25} - May. {22-25})
    Director, Problem Setter

  • International Collegiate Programming Contest (ICPC)

    • Honorable mention, 2025 ICPC {Seoul, Yokohama} Regional
    • Honor, 2024 ICPC {Seoul, Jakarta} Regional

  • Samsung Collegiate Programming Cup (SCPC)

    • Finalist, 2023 SCPC

Internships

  • NetSys Lab. (Prof. Younghoon Kim) (Mar. 25 - Sep. 25)
    Undergraduate Internship

item.title: Education
item.description:
• M.S. in School of Computing, KAIST (Mar. 26 - Present)
  • B.S. in Software and Computer Engineering, Ajou University (Mar. 19 - Feb. 26)
    • Graduated with highest honor(1st)
    • Distinguished Graduate Award, recognized for distinguished external achievements

item.title: Publications
item.description:
International Publications

In progress :)

Domestic Publications

  • Online Approaches for Abelian Duplication in Strings : Design and Applications
    Hyunbin Kim, Dajung Cho
    Korea Conference on Software Engineering, 2025 (KCSE ‘25)

  • Algorithms for Searching Maximum-Length Abelian Duplications in Strings
    Hyunbin Kim, Dajung Cho
    KIISE Transactions on Computing Practices, 2025 (KTCP ‘25)

  • Abelian duplications on strings and string searching algorithms
    Hyunbin Kim, Chiwook Ahn, Dajung Cho
    Korea Computer Congress, 2024 (KCC ‘24) (Excellent Paper Award)
